name: Cozyla
0:
”Alexa, ask My Album to hide your window”
”Alexa, ask My Album to set brightness to one hundred”
”Alexa, ask My Album to turn off screen”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my album
Developer Terms of Use
des: We currently support the Cozyla Album Alexa command including Channel & Photo control, device brightness adjustment, Sleep (Turn off screen) or exit sleep mode. Display or Hide Alexa response window. More features will be added soon.
